benchmark_details.name: Tenyidie Syllabification Corpus
benchmark_details.overview: The contribution of this work is the creation of 10,120 syllabified Tenyidie words and the application of deep learning techniques on the created corpus.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The main aim of our work is the creation of 10,120 words syllabified Tenyidie words and apply deep learning techniques on the created corpus.

data.source: Collected from news data (Tenyidie news daily 'CAPI') and annotated manually.

methods: Deep Learning architectures (LSTM, BLSTM, BLSTM+CRF, Encoder-decoder)
methodology.calculation: Accuracy (%) = no of words syllabified correctly / Total no. of words x 100%
methodology.interpretation: The accuracy of the syllabification is evaluated at the word level.
